content:
Ulrik Buchholtz said:

Davi Sales Barreira you're welcome to join the Summer school this Summer on HoTT: https://www.uwo.ca/math/faculty/kapulkin/seminars/hottest_summer_school_2022.html
We'll use Egbert Rijke 's introductory book; if you follow the link to the discord server, you can find the book in the #resources channel.

Thanks a lot! The summer school looks awesome! I'll definitely attend
